formBody: This is a previously planned event, and not something that just happened to take place. The expectation is that your CPD Submission will contain at least two planned events.

questionGroups.title: To be filled out before the event.

questions.title: When will this learning opportunity take place?
What are you planning to learn?
questions.body: Write a description of the expected outcome from this event or meeting.
questions.tooltip: Write a description of the expected outcome from this event or meeting.

questions.title: How are you planning to learn it?
questions.body: Write a description of the event or meeting.
questions.tooltip: Write a description of the event or meeting.

questionGroups.title: To be filled out after the event.

questions.title: Give an example of how this learning benefited your patients or service users?
questions.body: Explain the actual learnings from this planned event.
questions.tooltip: Explain the actual learnings from this planned event.
